description:
**Tool Overview**:

The Adobe Acrobat and Reader updates are critical patches designed to address security vulnerabilities in Adobe's software.

**Details**:
These updates resolve two critical CVEs (Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures) that could allow unauthorized actions or breaches in security settings within Adobe products. Users should ensure that they are running the latest versions of Adobe Acrobat and Reader to mitigate these security risks effectively. The updates not only provide necessary security fixes but also enhance the overall performance of the applications. To apply these updates, users can typically navigate to the 'Help' section of the Adobe program and select 'Check for Updates' to initiate the process of downloading and installing the latest patches.

For details on the updates, users can refer to the official Adobe security bulletin at [Adobe Security Notifications](https://helpx.adobe.com/security.html).
